input.sentences: annual sambhavi day gave us an opportunity to help so many children in need .
the children of our church performed the traditional prayer for guests .
we are all very proud that we could support the parents of the special needs children .
the money raised will help buy equipment that will make lives better .
all of our hard work was rewarded by the children 's smiling faces !
output.sentences: The event that day at the school was an opportunity to learn about sambhavi.
The special event was to support sambhavi pride.
The event raised money to save lives.
Those who created the event were rewarded with the shared smiles from their hard work.
